coal的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... baking coal 粘结性煤 bastard coal 硬煤（劣质煤） binding coal 结块煤； 粘结性煤.

entry.def: If you refer to something as a bastardized form of something else, you mean that the first thing is similar to or copied from the second thing, but is of much poorer quality.

means.word_mean: 1. deriving from more than one source or style
